{{Infobox_Broadcast | | call_letters = DZOZ-TV (Light TV 33) | city = [[Pasig City]] | station_logo = | | station_branding = Light TV 33 Manila| | station_slogan = ''Live Love, Celebrate Life'',
''Kaibigan Mo!''| | analog = 33 ([[Ultra high frequency|UHF]])| | digital = | | affiliations = [[ZOE Broadcasting Network|Light TV]] | founded = November 27, 2006 (As UniversiTV)
March 10, 2008 (As ZOE TV 33/ZTV 33)
March 1, 2011 (as Light TV 33)| | location = [[Metro Manila]]| | owner = [[ZOE Broadcasting Network]]| | sister_stations = [[DZOE-TV]] ([[GMA News TV]])
[[DZBB-TV]] ([[GMA Network]]) (currently affiliator of the DZOE-TV Channel 11)| | callsign_meaning = DZOZ| | former_affiliations = [[UniversiTV]] (2006-2008)| | effective_radiated_power = 50 KW (Max ERP: 1.5 megawatts)| | homepage = [http://www.lightnetwork.ph/ www.lightnetwork.ph] }} '''DZOZ-TV''' (Light TV 33) is a UHF television station of [[ZOE Broadcasting Network]]. DZOZ-TV studios are located at Strata 2000 Bldg., Ortigas Center, Pasig City. Its transmitter is located in Sumulong Highway, [[Antipolo City]]. It was started as [[UniversiTV]] in [[2006]], then ZOE TV-33 and together they combined & renamed as Light TV-33 last March 1, 2011. It airs from 12nn - 12 mn. ==See also== *[[ZOE Broadcasting Network]] {{Philippines-tv-station-stub}} {{Metro Manila TV}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dzoz-Tv}} [[Category:Television stations in Metro Manila]] [[ceb:DZJV-TV]] [[tl:DZOZ-TV]]
